front.title: IGMPv3/MLDv2 and Multicast Routing Protocol Interaction

abstract.t: The definitions of IGMPv3 and MLDv2 require new behavior within the multicast routing protocols. The additional source information contained in IGMPv3 and MLDv2 messages necessitates multicast routing protocols to manage and utilize the information. This document will describe how multicast routing protocols will interact with these source-filtering group management protocols.
